adjectives.description: suicidal (comparative more suicidal, superlative most suicidal)

examples: He is an authority on the precursors of suicidal behavior.

entries.meaning: (of a person) Likely to commit, or to attempt to commit, suicide.
examples: After losing his job, his wife, and his leg in a single week, he became suicidal.

entries.meaning: (of a voluntarily-chosen course of action) Highly likely to certain to result in the deaths of the participants; dangerous or reckless to such a degree as to be tantamount to suicide for those taking part.

examples: His driving habits are utterly suicidal.

entries.meaning: Someone suicidal; someone likely to kill themselves.
